We would like to inform you that your Personal Information is solely used only for providing and improving the application and user experience. The data is neither outsourced nor used for any personal use. By using the android application, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

While using our android application, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identity you. Personally Identifiable information may include your name, E-mail or mentioned otherwise.

In addition, we may use third party services such as Google Analytics that collect, monitor and analyze the data sent to and fro our website. We are also using the services of Google Adsense for the generation of revenue through the ads of your interest and pleasure.

We may use your Personal Information to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information that will solely be used for your better experience.

The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute your Personal, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

This Privacy Policy is effective as of 2019 and will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future, which will be in effect after being posted on this page.\n\nWe reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time and you should check this Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of the Service or android app after we post any modifications to the Privacy Policy on this page will constitute your acknowledgement of the modification and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified Privacy Policy.

NCERT Books, Chapter-Wise Solutions and Notes 6th - 12th Offline is an initiative of our team (logicalpaper.co) to provide free study material to all the school students of various boards like CBSE Board, ICSE/ISC Board, Delhi Board and Tamil State Board. NCERT Books, Chapter-Wise Solutions and Notes 6th - 12th Offline is developed to help the students in all possible ways. NCERT Books, Chapter-Wise Solutions and Notes 6th - 12th Offline provides the following books for CBSE and other boards students like NCERT Books, NCERT Solution, NCERT Notes, exemplary books, etc.

		NCERT Books, Chapter-Wise Solutions and Notes 6th - 12th Offline is designed in such a simplified way that any student of any class, be it of class 12th or 6th, can easily use this application. NCERT Books, Chapter-Wise Solutions and Notes 6th - 12th Offline provides all the important study material to students which could play vital role in their examination and helps them in scoring their best. NCERT Books, Chapter-Wise Solutions and Notes 6th - 12th Offline comes with a lot of necessary resources for most of the boardData students like Sample Papers, Past Year Papers, Blueprint, Guess Paper and Marking Scheme for class 9th, 10th, 11th and 12th. For boardData classes like CBSE 10th and CBSE 12th we have also provided the boardData topper’s answer sheet which is released by the examination boardData after the result declaration.

		If you have any query, suggestion or complain contact us at prepskoolacademy@gmail.com
